trans-unit.source: Represents a selectable item inside a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Menu"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个可选择项内的<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Menu"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: MenuItem is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl>, which means its header and collection of objects can be of any type (such as string, image, or panel).
trans-unit.target: MenuItem 是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl>，这意味着其标头和对象的集合可以是任何类型 （如字符串、 图像或面板）。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl> class.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl>类。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: A MenuItem can have submenus.
trans-unit.target: 菜单项可以有子菜单。

trans-unit.source: The submenu of the MenuItem is made up of the objects within the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection> of a MenuItem.
trans-unit.target: 菜单项的子菜单中的对象组成<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection>的 MenuItem。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection>

trans-unit.source: It is common for a MenuItem to contain other MenuItem objects to create nested submenus.
trans-unit.target: 很常见的菜单项以包含其他 MenuItem 对象以创建嵌套子菜单。

trans-unit.source: A MenuItem can have one of several functions: - It can be selected to invoke a command.
trans-unit.target: MenuItem 可以具有多个函数之一:-可以选择它来调用命令。

trans-unit.source: - It can be a separator for other menu items.
trans-unit.target: -它可以是其他菜单项的分隔符。

trans-unit.source: - It can be a header for a submenu.
trans-unit.target: -它可以是子菜单的标头。

trans-unit.source: - It can be checked or unchecked.
trans-unit.target: -它可以是选中或取消选中。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > By default, the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> of a MenuItem is set to <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 默认情况下，<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>设置菜单项的为<xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default horizontal position of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> is <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>为<xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> a 默认水平位置

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A> property of a MenuItem through a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>, the stack panel's default is applied and the item is centered.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A>属性通过 MenuItem <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>，堆栈面板的默认值将应用并且该项会居中。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A>

trans-unit.source: TheMenuItem handles the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseDown> event, so if you attach an event handler to <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseDown>, your handler will never be called.
trans-unit.target: TheMenuItem 句柄<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseDown>事件，因此，如果附加到事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseDown>，永远不会调用你的处理程序。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseDown> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseDown>

trans-unit.source: To add your own handler, subscribe to the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewMouseDown> event or subscribe to <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseDown> by calling <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29> with `handledEventsToo` set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要添加你自己的处理程序，订阅<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewMouseDown>事件或订阅<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseDown>通过调用<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29>与`handledEventsToo`设置为`true`。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseDown> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewMouseDown>

trans-unit.source: Customizing the MenuItem Control To apply the same property settings to multiple MenuItem controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: MenuItem 控件到自定义适用于多个菜单项控件，使用的相同的属性设置<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: 你可以修改默认<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>提供独特外观的控制。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关创建<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>，请参阅[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有的控件的外观](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the MenuItem, see [Menu Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 若要查看的部件和特定于菜单项的状态，请参阅[菜单样式和模板](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: 对于此控件的依赖项属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: 如果属性设置的默认样式，该属性可能会更改从其默认值，如果控件出现在应用程序中。

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: 桌面主题用应用程序运行时确定的默认样式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认 WPF 主题](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in MenuItem control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 设置 visual 属性仅会产生作用如果该属性既存在 MenuItem 控件的默认模板中，通过设置。

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).
trans-unit.target: 可以在的"更改 Visual 结构的控件"一节中找到的可视属性列表[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有的控件的外观](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the command associated with the menu item.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与菜单项关联的命令。

trans-unit.source: This property is used to associate a command with a particular <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> instance.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于将命令关联与特定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>实例。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: The following example associates the **Copy** command with a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> and automatically supplies the input gesture text **Ctrl+C**.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例将**复制**命令<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>并自动提供的输入的笔势文本**Ctrl + C**。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: The example does not set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.Header%2A> property, but the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.Header%2A> for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> is "Copy" at run time.
trans-unit.target: 该示例不会设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.Header%2A>属性，但<xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.Header%2A>为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>是在运行时的"复制"。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.Header%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl.Header%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can specify another header for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> if you want it to be different.
trans-unit.target: 你可以指定另一个标头<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>如果你希望不同。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: For information on how to bind to the desired command, see [Add a Command to a MenuItem](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/013d68a0-5373-4a68-bd91-5de574307370).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何将绑定到所需命令的信息，请参阅[命令添加到 MenuItem](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/013d68a0-5373-4a68-bd91-5de574307370)。

trans-unit.source: The CommandTarget property specifies the element where the command occurs.
trans-unit.target: CommandTarget 属性指定该命令的出现位置的元素。

trans-unit.source: If CommandTarget is not set, the element that has keyboard focus will receive the command.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置 CommandTarget，具有键盘焦点的元素将接收命令。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the menu selects different item containers, depending on the type of the item in the underlying collection or some other heuristic.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示菜单是否选择不同的项的容器，具体取决于基础集合或某些其他启发式方法中的项的类型。

trans-unit.source: This property is useful if you want to create a menu by binding to a collection.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是很有用，如果你想要创建菜单通过绑定到集合。

trans-unit.source: The item container is the UI element that displays the object in a collection.
trans-unit.target: 项容器是显示集合中的对象的用户界面元素。

trans-unit.source: If you want to bind to a collection to create a menu that contains <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> objects and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Separator> objects, set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MenuBase.UsesItemContainerTemplate%2A> property to true and create an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerTemplate> for each type of object in your collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要绑定到集合以创建包含菜单<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>对象和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Separator>对象，设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MenuBase.UsesItemContainerTemplate%2A>属性为 true，创建<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerTemplate>为每个类型的集合中的对象。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MenuBase.UsesItemContainerTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Separator> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerTemplate> must contain either a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> or a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Separator>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerTemplate>其中一种<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>或一种<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Separator>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Separator></xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>必须包含</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerTemplate>每个
